summary: This is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel discussing a quick conversation about Epstein, with one person noting their work cell hasn't worked for calls for two weeks. The emails coordinate a call time between 10-11 AM before another meeting with 'Geoff' at 1 PM.

persons.name: Wilson, Alexander
persons.context: Email recipient mentioned in the 'To' field; appears to be part of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Geoff
persons.context: Mentioned as someone the email sender is 'chatting with at 1' PM, indicating a scheduled meeting about Epstein-related matters.

connections.description: Both are involved in Epstein-related discussions within the U.S. Attorney's Office, with coordination of conversations around meetings.

events.title: Epstein discussion coordination
events.description: Email exchange coordinating a phone call about Epstein between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel, scheduled between 10-11 AM, before a meeting with Geoff at 1 PM.

locations: United States Attorney's Office Southern District of New York
keyFacts: Email exchange dated April 15, 2020, between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel discussing Epstein.
One participant notes their work cell hasn't worked for phone calls for two weeks.
Coordination for a call between 10-11 AM before a meeting with 'Geoff' at 1 PM.
Shows ongoing Epstein-related communication within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York in 2020.
Document is part of the EFTA00105425.pdf file from Data Set 9 of Epstein case documents.
